thread.section_title: Phoenix Financial Group Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Phoenix Financial Group | pfgtax.com
thread.title: Neil Grey
thread.title_full: Phoenix Financial Group reviewed by Neil Grey

author: Neil Grey
title: Neil Grey
text: The IRS kept transferring me around and I never seemed to get anywhere, meanwhile the penalties and interest kept accruing....My PFG tax team got a hold of my IRS representative and finally got everything straightened out....The IRS made a huge mistake and PFG got everything corrected and resolved. I would highly recommend their service to anyone struggling with tax issues!!
